name: Watermelon and Feta Salad
author: Lee Jackson
summary: I made up this salad one day when I bought a watermelon on special and didn't know what to do with it. It sounds unusual but it really works... It's great as a fresh starter or as an accompaniment to grilled fish or even a hot spicy curry to act as a cooler.
ingredients: ½  watermelon, cut into bite-sized cubes
1 (4 ounce) package Greek feta cheese, cubed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Mix red onion and lime juice together in a bowl
Refrigerate until onion turns bright pink, about 30 minutes
Add watermelon, feta cheese, olives, cilantro, parsley, and olive oil to the onion mixture; mix well
Add brown sugar if lime juice tastes too sharp
